news_header: Ten pilgrims died in a vehicle collision while traveling to the Maha Kumbh Mela in India. A car from Chattisgarh crashed into a bus on the Prayagraj-Mirzapur highway, injuring 19 others.
news_original_title: India: 10 Maha Kumbh devotees killed in car crash
news_text: Uttar Pradesh Chief Minister Yogi Adityanath has ordered relief efforts, and President Droupadi Murmu expressed condolences. The Maha Kumbh Mela, the world's largest human gathering, is currently taking place in Prayagraj, with over 500 million attendees. The festival has seen tragedies, including a recent stampede and another collision that resulted in deaths.
